name: MaterialHardshipDiagnoses
title: Material Hardship Diagnoses
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> 
The value sets in this group represent the diagnoses associated with material hardship as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of condition.code.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

Unable to afford blood pressure monitor (finding)

Unable to obtain internet service in residence due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to heat residence due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain healthcare due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain electricity in residence due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to cool residence due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain telephone due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain clinical equipment and/or device due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain childcare due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain adult dependent care due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain telephone service due to limited financial resources (finding)
Unable to obtain medication (finding)
Basic services unavailable in physical environment
Material hardship due to limited financial resources, not elsewhere classified
Encounter for counseling for socioeconomic factors
Patient's intentional underdosing of medication regimen due to financial hardship
Patient's noncompliance with other medical treatment and regimen due to financial hardship
Caregiver's intentional underdosing of patient's medication regimen due to financial hardship
